title: gearbest.com - Health Care Wrist Portable Digital Automatic Blood Pressure Monitor - WHITE - 11,05 $* inkl. Versand
text: Health Care Wrist Portable Digital Automatic Blood Pressure Monitor USD 11.05 Discount:62% OFF FREE SHIPPING 4.9 (221 Customer Reviews) Description Health Care Wrist Portable Digital Automatic Blood Pressure Monitor Household Type Protect your life now!Do you want to detect high blood pressure before it becomes a serious problem?The wrist blood pressure monitor is compact and effortlessly portable and incredibly easy to use.Quickly and quietly measures blood pressure and heart rate for accurate results and displays it on the large digital panel.This lightweight wrist blood pressure monitor makes it easy to check your blood pressure anywhere, from the office to on the go. Description: Quick and accurate measurement of blood pressure and pulse.Warning heart blinker, shows that the monitor is taking measurement.Wrist type model with simple operation of just 1 button push.Guide standards for assessment of high blood pressure.Ideal for the daily monitoring of blood pressure.Automatic determines ideal cuff inflation.Average value for last three records.Selectable between mmhg and kpa.Irregular heart beating signal.High and low pulse rate indicators.Large and clear LCD, easy to read. Features: Type: Wrist Blood Pressure Monitor.Wrist circumference: 135 ~ 195 mm.Measurement Range:Pulse rate: 40 ~ 165 beats / min.Pressure: within 3 mmHg.Pulse rate: within 5 percent of reading.Power supply: 2 x AAA alkaline batteries (not included).Memory capacity: 90 groups of data Specification
